# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can purchase this exceptional product for $145. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience at a special price. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer
